short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button on any package page to copy a YAML formatted version string to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a small button next to the package title that, when clicked, will copy a YAML formatted dependency string to your clipboard, for the package you're looking at
